1.4 2000:4 1.4 2001:1 1.4 2001:2 1.5 2001:3 1.6 2001:4 1.7 2002:1 1.5 2002:2 1.5 2002:3 1.5 2002:4 1.6 2003:1 1.6 2003:2 1.5 2003:3 1.7 2003:4 1.6 2004:1 1.5 2004:2 1.5 2004:3 1.6 2004:4 1.6 2005:1 1.6 2005:2 1.6 2005:3 1.8 2005:4 1.8 2006:1 1.8 2006:2 1.9 2006:3 2.1 2006:4 2.2 2007:1 2.5 2007:2 2.3 2007:3 2.4 2007:4 2.5 2008:1 2.6 2008:2 2.5 2008:3 2.5 2008:4 2.5 2009:1 2.4 2009:2 2.2 2009:3 2.2 2009:4 2.3 2010:1 2.3 2010:2 2.2 2010:3 2.1 2010:4 2.3 2011:1 2.2 2011:2 2.2 2011:3 2.1 2011:4 2 Note: Vertical shading represents NBER recession dates (approximately early to late 1979, late 1980 to the end of 1981, mid 1989 through early 1990, early 2000 though late 2000, and 2007 though mid 2008.) Source: Census Bureau.
